-1.name: REASONABLE_TIME
-1.description: No fixed statutory deadline. Agency must respond within a reasonable time based on circumstances.
-1.map_display_note: Show tooltip: 'No fixed deadline - varies by request'

-2.name: PROMPTLY
-2.description: Agency must respond 'promptly' but without a specific day count mandated by statute.
-2.map_display_note: Show tooltip: 'Prompt response required - typically within days'

-3.name: IMMEDIATE
-3.description: Certain records must be made available immediately without delay.
common_factors: Record type (arrest logs, booking photos, etc.)
-3.applies_to: Specific record types only (not all requests)

-4.name: VARIABLE_BY_TYPE
-4.description: Response timeline varies based on request type, complexity, or track assignment.
-4.map_display_note: Show tooltip: 'Timeline varies by request type'

positive_codes_interpretation.description: Positive integers represent fixed statutory deadlines
positive_codes_interpretation.unit: days (business or calendar as specified in jurisdiction data)

usage_notes.map_interface: Display response timeline with appropriate formatting based on code
usage_notes.tooltip_behavior: Negative codes should trigger informational tooltips
usage_notes.color_coding: Consider color-coding fixed vs flexible deadlines on map
usage_notes.user_education: Link to detailed explanation for negative codes
